701541f-a.title: Bronx: Olinville Avenue - Mace Avenue
701541f-a.text:
Olinville Avenue, west side, south from (No. 2443) but not
including Mace Avenue. In the foreground, cutting across the cliff,
appears what still remains of the old White Plains Road which was
the main northbound route along the eastern shore of the Bronx River
before the present White Plains Road was laid out sometime after
1900. Still earlier this road was part of the Williamsbridge Road.
In the background is Public School 96, at Waring Avenue.
April 3, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
